Explorer Devices Profile Network Statistics Claimed Active Weather Station-Days The amount of daily weather data generated by stations. One station generates one weather-station-day if it provides high quality data throughout the day. $WXM Rewards Station owners are rewarded in $WXM for providing data to the WeatherXM Network. Total Weather Stations The number of weather stations manufactured and registered on the network. Claimed Weather Stations The number of weather stations already claimed by users. Active Weather Stations The number of weather stations that were active during the last day. The average amount of tokens rewarded to a weather station in the last 30 days. Last Day Last Run Last 30 Days Join the weather revolution Earn %s $WXM/mo $WXM Token View token contract on Etherscan View rewards contract on Arbiscan Total Supply Total supply refers to the number of $WXM that have already been created and are either in circulation or locked. Circulating Supply Circulating supply refers to the number of $WXM that are publicly available and circulating in the market. Are you a station manufacturer? Join the ecosystem Last Updated on %s Total Search station name or address Recent Your search returned no results Try searching for something else or check for spelling mistakes. No recent search results Search for station name or address. Most recent results appear here. The search query must be at least 2 characters long. Go to your location Search error My Profile Total Earned Total Earned represents the sum of all tokens generated by your weather stations. It\'s the overall amount you\'ve earned since you started contributing data to WeatherXM. Total Claimed Total Claimed reflects the tokens you\'ve successfully claimed and withdrawn into your personal wallet. These are the rewards you\'ve converted from your earned tokens for personal use or other purposes. Allocated Rewards Νο allocated rewards yet! You can also claim your allocated rewards by visiting claim.weatherxm.com from a desktop web browser. Having trouble claiming? Try visiting claim.weatherxm.com from a desktop browser. Claim your WXM device by clicking the + button or browse the map and add stations to your favorites. Just now No stations yet? View Explorer Map All displayed times are in the Station’s timezone (%s). Station Offline Unknown Address No Data We\’re unable to show updated station data. Please make sure your station is operational and connected to the internet. Observations Forecast We\’re unable to show live station data. Please check back later for further updates. Station must be updated In order for your station to keep operating normally and receive $WXM rewards, you must update your station. Update Station Now Update Station Connecting to Station… Downloading Update… Update download in progress.
Do not switch off the Application! Make sure you don\'t move away from your station as you might lose Bluetooth connection! Installing Update… Connect to Station Download Firmware Update Install Firmware Update Station not in range We couldn\’t reach your station. Please make sure the station is powered up, and you are close enough for the Bluetooth connection to work. Station not yet paired In order to be able to update your station, you must first pair it via Bluetooth. To do so, please follow the instructions below. Tap the \"Pair Device\" button below. Station Updated Your station is updated to the latest Firmware! Update Failed Updating failed, please try again! If the problem persists, please contact our support team at support.weatherxm.com.

Please make sure to mention that you’re facing an Error %s for faster resolution. There is a brand new firmware update for your station.
We highly recommend you update, as this will improve the experience you’ll have with your WeatherXM station! We highly recommend you update, as this will improve the experience you’ll have with your WeatherXM station! New Update A new update of this app has been released. Please click the button below to go to Play Store and update the app.

After updating please restart the app. Continue without updating Update What\'s New: Password Reset Send Email Email has been sent! If your e-mail is registered with us you will receive instructions for resetting your password. Enter the email associated with your WeatherXM account and we will send you a password reset link. By deleting your account, you will no longer be eligible to gain $WXM rewards, and, you will no longer be able to view your station data in the WeatherXM apps. This will delete the following data:
• Your name.
• Your email address.
• Your station(s) details, their location, and their token rewards history This will not delete:
• The weather data you’ve shared with the network.
• The $WXM rewards you’ve collected. These are yours forever! We do not collect nor store any personal data! If you have any questions regarding your data and the deletion of your account, please contact our support team at support.weatherxm.com. I understand what deleting my WeatherXM account means. Deleting Account… Account Deleted We hate to see you go, and would like to hear why this happened.\n\nWe’d appreciate it if you could share your feedback with us! It will only take 5 minutes and will help us understand what went wrong! Deletion Failed Deletion failed, please try again! If the problem persists, please contact our support team at support.weatherxm.com.

Please make sure to mention that you’re facing an Error %s for faster resolution. Cancel Deletion Retry Deleting Account Validating Password… Take a Short Survey Confirm Password To Proceed Type your password Add Wallet Now Wallet Address is Missing! You haven\’t added a wallet yet. Thus, we will not be able to send you any $WXM rewards. It is highly recommended to use MetaMask, as it is the most compatible wallet. My Wallet Check compatibility here Wallet Compatibility Not sure if you own a $WXM compatible wallet? If your wallet is not compatible you may not be able to redeem or use $WXM rewards! Enter your wallet address Edit Wallet Address E.g., 0xDe1f*****B7F5 Create a MetaMask wallet here I acknowledge that I have ownership and full access to this wallet. I have read and accept the Terms of Service. Success: Address Saved. Save Wallet Address Confirm Wallet Ownership Please make sure you have the complete ownership of the Wallet ending in %1$s.\n\nIf you don\’t, you will lose all $WXM rewards from now on! In order to edit the Wallet Address you need to confirm you are the owner of this account.
Please type in your password to edit Wallet Address. View Transaction History Sign Up Create Account Email * First Name Last Name Don\'t have an account? Signup with your email and your account will be created shortly. Thanks for joining WeatherXM! We have sent you an account activation link to %s. Please, set a password and then try to login. Not receiving an activation email? Contact our support team. Reward Timeline View Timeline You’ve reached the end of the Timeline. Rewards %s $WXM + %s $WXM Daily Reward Earnings for %s Base Reward Earned +%1$s $WXM of the %2$s $WXM Daily Max. Boosts No Active View Reward Details Weekly Streak Base reward scores from %1$s to %2$s Total Station Rewards Minor issues slightly affected your rewards. This may happen occasionally, but we thought you should know. View reward details to identify and fix problems. Some issues prevent your station from getting the full rewards. View reward details to identify and fix problems. Serious problems were detected, that prevent the station from getting the full rewards. View reward details to identify and fix problems. Rewards Coming Soon! Station hasn’t received any rewards yet. Sit back and relax, while our systems are validating the station’s location and data. The station should start receiving rewards in the next couple of days. Pro Tip Don’t worry if you see any errors and reward losses for the first 2–3 days after claiming your station. This is expected. Keep calm and wait for the full rewards! Reward Issues Report for %s Issues Data Quality Good job! A solid 100%. Almost perfect! Got %d%%. Data quality is great! Got %d%%. Fix any pending issues to earn more rewards. Data quality is great! Got %d%%. Data quality is OK! Got %d%%. Fix any pending issues to earn more rewards. Data quality is OK! Got %d%%. Data quality is average! Got %d%%. Fix any pending issues to earn more rewards. Data quality is average! Got %d%%. Data quality is low! Got %d%%. Fix any pending issues to earn more rewards. Data quality is low! Got %d%%. Data quality is very low! Got %d%%. Fix any pending issues to earn more rewards. Data quality is very low! Got %d%%. Station lost all rewards because of data quality issues. No information about data quality is available at the moment. Location Quality No location data. Location could not be verified. Station was recently relocated. Station location is verified! Cell Ranking Station ranking is great! Active Boosts Earned +%s $WXM additional rewards from boosts. No active boosts for this station at the moment More reward boosts coming soon. WeatherXM’s goal is to become an open, decentralized ecosystem structured in such a way that network growth, and thereby balanced global weather coverage, is incentivised and every participant (weather station owners and service providers) is fairly and organically rewarded in accordance to the value they contribute to the network.\n\nStation owners are responsible for deploying and maintaining their stations and ensuring the best possible quality of weather data following the Network’s guidelines of deployment. In return, they are rewarded in the Network’s token, called $WXM.\n\nEvery day, our reward algorithm assesses the performance of all weather stations, calculates the Base Reward and any additional rewards originating from various active “Boosts”, and allocates the total reward amount to each user’s connected wallet.\n\nRead more about how our Reward Mechanism works. The Network is as good as its data and we need our data to be meaningful and usable. The Quality-of-Data (QoD) score is the quantification of this metric. The end goal is to encourage weather station owners to do their best to comply with the Network’s guidelines in order to consistently achieve the best data quality possible.\n\nA weather station’s daily reward is affected by its QoD score. To calculate the QoD score, we have created an open source algorithm that evaluates the quality of the weather data using various methods. The calculated score indicates the confidence level in the quality of the weather data received from the station.\n\nRead more about how our Quality-of-Data algorithm works. It is important for the Network that a station remains at the same location throughout its lifetime.\n\nThe Proof-of-Location algorithm evaluates location data associated with the station, their accuracy, and consistency. It generates a score which is a confidence indicator about the station’s location.\n\nRead more about how our Proof-of-Location algorithm works. Cell ranking is a measure of a station’s performance relative to others within the same cell - a hexagonal area, covering approximately 5 square kilometers (2 square miles) on the planet.\n\nCell capacity is a parameter that is used to define the maximum number of stations that are eligible for rewards in a specific cell. Every cell has a predefined capacity that depends on its geospatial characteristics*.\n\nEvery station is ranked in its cell daily, based on its reward score and its seniority. As long as the station’s ranking is above the capacity threshold, it will be rewarded, whereas getting below it will lead to zero rewards. For example, in a cell with a max capacity of 5 stations, if a station is ranked 3rd it will get rewarded, but if it is ranked 7th, it won’t receive any rewards.\n\nRead more about how our Cell Capacity algorithm works.\n\n* The cell capacity is currently set to the fixed value of 10 rewardable stations, for every cell. Show Split Reward Split Rewards of this station are split between %d wallets. You can see the percentages below. %s (You) Daily Boost Score Boost tokens earned for %s (UTC) Lost %s $WXM because of data quality score. Boost Details This boost is rewarded for participating in our beta reward program from %1$s to %2$s. Rewardable station-hours Daily tokens to be rewarded (max) Total tokens to be rewarded (max) Boost period Great! Got all beta rewards for this day! Scan Again No Bluetooth No Bluetooth found. Cannot proceed. Go to Settings and Grant Access Scanning for WeatherXM Devices No Location Access In order to connect your device, WeatherXM app needs access to Location. If you do not wish to provide such access, you will not be able to proceed with claiming your weather station. Bluetooth is not enabled In order to connect your device, WeatherXM app needs an enabled Bluetooth. If you do not wish to provide such access, you will not be able to proceed with claiming your weather station. No Bluetooth Access In order to connect your device, WeatherXM app needs access to Bluetooth. If you do not wish to provide such access, you will not be able to proceed with claiming your weather station. No Devices Found We could not find any WeatherXM devices, please try to scan again! Scanning Failed Something went wrong! Please Scan Again. Claim a Weather Station Select your station type M5 | WiFi D1 | WiFi Pulse | 4G Confirm station location You need to confirm the station’s exact deployment location. Search for location Confirm and Proceed View Station Go to Station Quit Claiming Cancel Claiming Retry Claiming I acknowledge that the deployment location above is correct and will be used to verify the eligibility of the station’s rewards. Set and Claim Station Claimed Claiming Station… Sit tight, we’re pairing your account with your WeatherXM device! This process could take up to 2 minutes due to the Helium\'s network bandwidth limitations! Sit tight, we’re pairing your account with your WeatherXM gateway! This process could take up to 2 minutes! Your station is claimed under your account!
%s Connection Failed Something went wrong with the connection. Make sure you are near your weather station and retry claiming. If connection still fails, please unpair the station and restart the claiming process. For more details check our troubleshooting guide.

Alternatively, you can contact our support. Setting Up Station Rebooting Station Claiming Station Invalid Location Claim D1 | WiFi Claim M5 | WiFi Begin Station Claiming Connect the gateway to your WiFi Turn on the M5 gateway and swipe right to the settings screen. Select “Configure WiFi” and then press “Continue” on the screen. Connect your phone to the “WXM M5 XXX” WiFi network. Open your phone’s browser, and navigate to 10.10.0.1. Choose your WiFi network from the list and enter the WiFi password to connect your gateway. Turn on the WG1200 gateway and swipe right to the settings screen. Select “Configure WiFi” and then press “Continue” on the screen. Connect your phone to the “WXM_WG1200” WiFi network. If you’re having difficulty completing this step, make sure you watch the instructional video below! Prepare gateway for claiming The M5 gateway should reboot automatically. After it has rebooted, navigate to the bottom of the settings screen to reveal the QR Code and Serial Number. The WG1200 gateway reboots automatically. After it has rebooted, navigate to the “Claim Device” menu, in the settings. Find the Barcode on the back of your gateway. Press "Scan Barcode" to activate your phone’s camera and scan the barcode automatically. Alternatively, press “Enter S/N manually” to proceed to the next screen and enter your barcode. Scan the gateway’s QR Code that appears in the screen, as seen below. If your gateway is running on an older firmware version, you may have to enter the Serial Number Manually. Enter S/N Manually The QR Code you scanned is invalid. Please try again with a valid QR Code or enter manually. The Barcode you scanned is invalid. Please try again with a valid Barcode or enter manually. Proceed to Next Step Enter gateway Serial Number Enter gateway details Enter the gateway’s Serial Number that appears in the screen, as seen below. Type the barcode located on the back of your WG3000 gateway. Enter the gateway’s Claiming Key and Serial Number. They are located under the QR code. If your gateway is running on an older firmware version, screens may differ. Enter your gateway’s Serial Number 12:34:56:67:78:90:12:34:56:78 P1234567890123456 Enter your gateway’s Claiming Key 123456 Claim Helium Dev EUI Reset your device Reset I’ve reset my device Push the RESET button on the bottom of your WeatherXM device to enable Bluetooth pairing.

This will expire in 5 minutes. After that, you will need to push it again to restart the pairing! Tap the \"I\'ve Reset My Device\" button below. Please try again, and if the problem persists, contact support. The Pairing process with WS2000 has failed. Bluetooth is disabled. Please enable it and try again. Connecting to WS2000 has failed. Connection Rejected. Please try again, and if the problem persists, contact support. Rebooting WS2000 has failed. Please try again, and if the problem persists, contact support. Frequency Given the location of installation you defined in the previous step, we\’ve selected the appropriate frequency for %s. Set Your Station\'s Frequency Recommended for %s Helium\'s LoRaWAN Network requires that you set your station\’s frequency for gateway configuration for the country you\’ve installed your station.

A list of the countries and their respective frequencies can be found here. I hereby acknowledge that the frequency selected above is the correct one for the country you’ve installed and will operate this station in. Setting device\'s frequency failed. Please try again, and if the problem persists, contact support. Please make sure to mention that you’re facing an Error %s for faster resolution. Claim Pulse | 4G Reboot your gateway Press the POWER button on the top of your WeatherXM WG3000 gateway until it turns off. Press the POWER button once again until it turns back on. After reboot, the gateway should display a 6-digit key on the screen. Write it down as you will need to type it in a next step. The station has been rebooted. Type your gateway’s claiming key Upon reboot, the WG3000 gateway will display a 6-digit key on its display after a few minutes. Type it below. If the gateway does not display the 6-digit key, navigate to 4-Device Settings -> 4.1-Device Claiming and wait for the 6-digit key to be generated. Enter your gateway’s 6-digit key Enter 6-digit key Oops! No forecast weather data could not be found. Next 24 hours Next 7 days Daily Conditions Hourly Forecast History View Historical Data Oops! No weather data. Daily Precip. Precip. Rate Daily Max Rate Gust Speed Solar · No weather data found for your device for this day. No weather data found for your device for %s. Edit Name This friendly name is private. It will be visible only to you when you are logged in. Enter a new friendly name Short App Survey Thank you for your feedback! Improving your experience What we collect What we don\'t collect App Usage Data System version Personal data Identifying information You can always update your preferences in the app settings. To improve user experience in our apps, we are using analytics, for collecting crashes and other anonymous in-app events.
We do not collect ANY identifying information. Everything we collect will be used internally to improve your experience with WeatherXM. All data are anonymized! Station Settings Station’s Name Change Station’s Name Station\'s Frequency Change the frequency this station operates. To do this, make sure you’re close to your station, and that you’ve selected the appropriate frequency for your country.

A list of the countries and their respective frequencies can be found here. Change Frequency Reboot Station This action will enable other devices to pair via bluetooth with the Station. Up to 7 devices can be paired with this station.\n\nUsing a previously paired device, get in proximity to your station, and tap the button below. Remove Station Unclaim and remove this station from your account. You will not lose any allocated rewards, but you will not be able to view the station’s data or earn additional rewards in the future.
Learn more about it here. This action is not reversible! In order to remove your station you need to confirm you are the owner of this account.
Please type in your password to remove your station. Edit Station Location Editing the station’s location is subject to a relocation penalty and the station will be excluded from rewards for the next 2 days.
Read more here Confirm Location Location Confirmed! Your station’s location has been updated. The station should start earning rewards again when your location is verified by our systems in ~2–3 days. %d/10 stations present Cell Capacity Cell capacity is a parameter that is used to define the maximum number of stations that are eligible for rewards in a specific cell. Every cell has a predefined capacity that depends on its geospatial characteristics*\n\nEvery station is ranked in its cell daily, based on its reward score and its seniority. As long as the station’s ranking is above the capacity threshold, it will be rewarded, whereas getting below it will lead to zero rewards. For example, in a cell with a max capacity of 5 stations, if a station is ranked 3rd it will get rewarded, but if it is ranked 7th, it won’t receive any rewards.\n\nRead more about how our Cell Capacity algorithm works.\n\n* The cell capacity is currently set to the fixed value of 10 rewardable stations, for every cell. Understanding the Temperature Bars Weekly Range Bar The pale blue bar shows the minimum and maximum temperatures for the entire week. Daily Range Bar Inside the weekly range, the strong blue bar indicates daily’s temperature range. It shows how today’s high and low temperatures fit within the weekly range.
